Prerequisite(s): One Leaden Hyena Maneuver
Range: Close (25 ft + 5 ft/level)
Target: One creature
Duration: 1 round

Description

Mocking your opponent's feeble efforts, you instill within them a great deal of self-doubt that hampers their combat abilities. Make a Bluff check against the target against their opposed Sense Motive check or their AC, whichever is higher. On a success, any morale bonuses that the target possesses instead become penalties of equal amount, and any harmless spells that are affecting the target lose their effect for one round.
